body:
Hello,

the cause is in the type fix: https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/12666.
That leads to circular dependencies between:
- **vue.d.ts** https://github.com/vuejs/vue/blob/46ec64869479393f95b6abda7a4adecf19867d06/types/vue.d.ts#L17
- **v3-component-public-instance.d.ts** https://github.com/vuejs/vue/blob/46ec64869479393f95b6abda7a4adecf19867d06/types/v3-component-public-instance.d.ts#L8

I am experiencing the same error when trying to generate the TypeScript coverage report.

issue.title: RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded using vuelidate 0.7.x typings package

repository.name: vue
repository.description: This is the repo for Vue 2. For Vue 3, go to https://github.com/vuejs/core

issue.body:
### Version
2.7.8

### Reproduction link
[github.com](https://github.com/aKzenT/eslint-problem/tree/vue278)







### Steps to reproduce
npm install

npm run eslint

### What is expected?
eslint terminates normally

### What is actually happening?
RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded occurs:

    at getMappedType (C:\enbw\testeslint\node_modules\typescript\lib\typescript.js:63282:31)
    at getMappedType (C:\enbw\testeslint\node_modules\typescript\lib\typescript.js:63299:30)
    at C:\enbw\testeslint\node_modules\typescript\lib\typescript.js:63432:82
    at Object.map (C:\enbw\testeslint\node_modules\typescript\lib\typescript.js:638:29)
    at getObjectTypeInstantiation (C:\enbw\testeslint\node_modules\typescript\lib\typescript.js:63432:40)
    at instantiateTypeWorker (C:\enbw\testeslint\node_modules\typescript\lib\typescript.js:63666:28)
    at instantiateTypeWithAlias (C:\enbw\testeslint\node_modules\typescript\lib\typescript.js:63646:26)
    at instantiateType (C:\enbw\testeslint\node_modules\typescript\lib\typescript.js:63629:37)
    at instantiateList (C:\enbw\testeslint\node_modules\typescript\lib\typescript.js:63257:34)
    at instantiateTypes (C:\enbw\testeslint\node_modules\typescript\lib\typescript.js:63271:20)

---
The repo works when downgrading to vue 2.7.5. Vue 2.7.6 to 2.7.8 show this problem. I suspect it's a vue issue related to the typing information as I found similar problems in bug tracker for the latest versions. Just uninstalling the vuelidate typings package solves the problem. So it might be some type of typing conflict with vuelidate.

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

body: Should this be closed? Still happening on 2.7.13
The reason behind the error was @types/vuelidate": "^0.7.4". After removing it from dependencies the error was gone.

> The reason behind the error was @types/vuelidate": "^0.7.4". After removing it from dependencies the error was gone.

We had exactly the same version of vuelidate types and I can confirm that removing it from monorepo solved the problem.

Alternatively, if you need to keep @vuelidate types, there is an option with adding a patch to the package. https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/12750#issuecomment-1281494386
I'm having this error with no `@types/vuelidate` dependency. `Vue 2.7.14`
I have the same issue without using `vuelidate`. Had to rollback to `vue@2.7.5`

Hello, i've been searching for an issue in our project. I found that we had some Class components with `Mixins(...)`. Once removed it compiles just fine. Hope it helps to some of you :)
Tested on vue 2.7.14
